contents:
完全抵禦不了，橡膠子彈動能達到176焦耳。1. 胡椒彈氣槍-氣體推動 (Pepper Spray Projectile) = 17 Joules
2. 布袋彈-火藥推動 (12 Guage Shot Gun Bean Bag) = 150 Joules !
3. 橡膠子彈-火藥推動 (12 Guage Rubber Fin Rocket) = 176 Joules !!
4. 催淚彈-火藥推動 (37/38mm Chemical Munition CS Tear Gas) = 322 Joules !!!
5. 0.38 左輪手槍-火藥推動 (0.38 Revolver) = 350 Joules
6. 9 mm 半自動手槍-火藥推動 (9mm Semi-Auto Pistol) = 481 Joules
